description: Rudy Guede will complete the rest of his 16-year sentence doing community service, an Italian court rules.
title: Meredith Kercher: Rudy Guede to finish term doing community service
title_page: Meredith Kercher: Rudy Guede to finish term doing community service - BBC News
maintext: Guede left Perugia and travelled to Germany in the days after her killing. After his extradition back to Italy he chose a fast-track trial, held in a closed session without journalists present, and was subsequently convicted of the murder after his DNA was found at the scene.
